config.searchmenu.title: Search menu keybind
config.searchmenu.tooltip: Which keybind should open the search menu.
config.highlightchests.name: Highlight chests
config.highlightchests.tooltip: Whether to highlight chests containing searched items.
config.drawitemsoverchests.name: Draw items over chests
config.drawitemsoverthests.tooltip: Whether to draw searched items over chests.
config.limitdrawnitemsoverchests.name: Limit max drawn items
config.limitdrawnitemsoverthests.tooltip:
Whether to limit how many items can be drawn at once (per chest).
Note: having many items with chests near each other may cause drawn items to overlap.
config.maxitemsoverchests.name: Max drawn items
config.maxitemsoverthests.tooltip: How many items to draw at once (per chest).
config.drawdirection.name: Item display style
config.drawdirection.tooltip: Which style/orientation to use when displaying items over chests.
config.displayguidearrows.name: Display guide arrows
config.displayguidearrows.tooltip: Whether to display arrows pointing towards chests and/or when to display arrows.
